channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 据新闻网站报道，碧桂园在岸债券持有人尚未收到息票付款
item.description:
Country Garden onshore bondholders have not received coupon payment, news site reports https://t.co/JN9aWIlFYW pic.twitter.com/pt7iUedrOI

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：该公司表示，越来越多的 Reddit 新用户来自谷歌等搜索引擎。@AnitaRamaswamy 解释了为什么这对社交媒体平台来说是个风险，因为它计划很快上市
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: A growing number of new Reddit users came from search engines like Google, the company says. @AnitaRamaswamy explains why it is a risk for the social media platform, as it plans to go public soon pic.twitter.com/TKFmjmFS4J

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 市场：结束银行 "窗口指导 "的举措或将重塑美国回购市场
item.description:
In the Market: Bid to end bank 'window dressing' may reshape US repo market https://t.co/9mqrKrNTB6 pic.twitter.com/GPxO3qfyct

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 根据新加坡中央银行的一项调查，经济学家们上调了新加坡 2024 年的经济增长预期，认为外部增长好于预期是经济增长的最大动力。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Economists have upgraded Singapore's 2024 growth forecast, according to a survey by the country's central bank, with better-than-expected external growth seen as the top upside driver for the economy. More here: https://t.co/UQrxn15nOj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 普华永道澳大利亚公司表示，将再裁员 329 人，这是继一名前合伙人泄露政府税收计划的全国性丑闻后进行的重大重组的一部分。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
PwC Australia said it would cut an additional 329 jobs, part of a major restructuring that follows a national scandal in which a former partner leaked government tax plans. More here: https://t.co/9a91FCZtDX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 丰田公司同意为工厂工人加薪，这是丰田公司 25 年来最大的一次加薪，这增强了人们的预期，即丰厚的加薪将为央行下周进行关键的政策调整提供回旋余地。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Toyota agreed to give factory workers their biggest pay increase in 25 years, heightening expectations that bumper pay raises will give the central bank leeway to make a key policy shift next week. More here: https://t.co/Sq1FhfouG3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 德国 HQ Capital 聘请 Michael Hu 领航亚洲发展之路
item.description:
Germany's HQ Capital taps Michael Hu to steer Asia growth story https://t.co/I5tTozYzdS pic.twitter.com/K45bMgEstH

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 日本《每日新闻》称，丰田公司已同意完全满足其工会提出的年度加薪要求，因为日本顶级企业在与工会的年度会谈中很可能提出大幅加薪。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Toyota has agreed to fully meet its union's request for annual pay increases, the Mainichi newspaper said, as top Japanese companies look likely to offer sizeable salary hikes at annual talks with unions. More here: https://t.co/G5Zyf8eDqZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国航空运营商警告说，由于波音公司更多喷气式飞机的交付延迟，他们增加运力的计划受到质疑，波音公司的安全危机对航空业的打击正在加剧。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
US air carriers warned that their plans to increase capacity were in doubt due to more jet delivery delays from Boeing, as the hit to the airline industry from the planemaker's safety crisis worsens. More here: https://t.co/HSL0GNN38F

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：从为什么谷歌的人工智能聊天机器人 "双子座"（Gemini）不会回答有关全球选举的问题，到在#奥林匹克运动会#期间确保巴黎的安全。以下是本周人工智能革命的重大新闻汇总
item.description:
WATCH: From why Google’s AI chatbot Gemini won't answer questions about global elections, to keeping Paris safe during the #Olympics. Here is a round up of the week's big stories from the AI revolution pic.twitter.com/hVi5lD9Gyi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 道明银行首席执行官马斯拉尼因美国监管问题和 First Horizon 交易于 2023 年减薪
item.description:
TD CEO Masrani took a pay cut in 2023 amid US regulatory issues, First Horizon deal https://t.co/3MPm7COc5D pic.twitter.com/LngeMPlb7x

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：Reddit 称其四分之三的新用户来自谷歌等搜索引擎。@AnitaRamaswamy 解释说，这对于一个计划很快上市的平台来说是一个风险。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Reddit says some three-fourths of its new users came from search engines like Google. That’s a risk for a platform planning to go public soon, explains @AnitaRamaswamy pic.twitter.com/1dtHKnC1Ak

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：突尼斯橄榄油生产商穆斯塔法-姆蒂拉维（Mustapha Mtiraoui）如果将其产品装在贴有标签的瓶子里出口，而不是散装运输，就能赚到更多的钱。但该国橄榄油行业内部的问题使这一想法无法实现
item.description:
WATCH: Tunisian olive oil producer Mustapha Mtiraoui could make far more money by exporting his produce in labelled bottles, rather than shipping it in bulk. But problems inside the country's olive-oil sector make that impossible https://t.co/2pnyM5RpcE pic.twitter.com/3cQM5I7ItY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国航空公司警告说，波音飞机的交付将出现更多延误，因为这家飞机制造商在今年 1 月的一次飞行中因一块面板爆炸而陷入安全危机，导致对这起事件和公司生产流程的调查。更多信息
item.description:
US airlines warn of more Boeing delivery delays as the planemaker continues to deal with a safety crisis after a panel blew off a flight in midair in January, leading to probes into the incident and the company's production process. Read more: https://t.co/PV76QiXr9J pic.twitter.com/8P2wbZKpxO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 财政大臣称，削减英格兰银行储备金利息将是坏事

Cutting interest paid on Bank of England reserves would be bad, Treasury minister says https://t.co/htbYI08KJc pic.twitter.com/J2zVN7p5XT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：突尼斯橄榄油出口行业的基本问题--包括融资渠道、装瓶厂短缺以及少数大型生产商的主导地位--限制了该行业的发展，一位获奖的当地生产商如是说
item.description:
WATCH: Basic problems inside Tunisia’s olive-oil export sector — including access to financing, a shortage of bottling plants and the dominant position of a handful of bigger producers — are restricting its growth, an award-winning local producer says https://t.co/2pnyM5RpcE pic.twitter.com/wKBUfeRVhY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 视频更正：汉莎航空客舱乘务员工会呼吁其成员在汉莎航空和短途航空公司 CityLine 举行罢工，以满足他们对高薪的要求，争取将工资提高 15%。我们正在删除音频缺失的视频
item.description:
VIDEO CORRECTION: Lufthansa's cabin crew union called on its members to strike at Lufthansa and short-haul carrier CityLine to press their demands for higher pay, seeking a 15% wage increase. We are deleting videos with some missing audio https://t.co/N71q0R7dKm pic.twitter.com/7DDrYVwDxg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国航空公司警告说，由于波音公司更多喷气式飞机延迟交付，他们的运力增加计划受到质疑，而波音公司的安全危机对航空业的打击正在加剧。更多信息
item.description:
US carriers warned that their capacity-increase plans were in doubt due to more jet delivery delays from Boeing, as the hit to the airline industry worsens due to the planemaker's safety crisis. Read more: https://t.co/PV76QiXr9J pic.twitter.com/qhyb5B9fws

item.title: 观看：保时捷正在换挡。该汽车制造商表示，今年的利润率将有所下降，因为它正致力于推出四款新车型
item.description:
WATCH: Porsche is shifting into a lower gear. The carmaker said that profitability would be cut this year as it worked on launching four new models https://t.co/Lxh3yQpx1W pic.twitter.com/WYMzEI5kni

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024
